It was funny until she punched me in the eye and it stayed half shut all night. Ask L-MO Joey about the time I put my bare but cheeks on his face and farted while he was sleeping in my studio.

i'd rather be someone who's playing for the first time in a few years and can pull off a simple song than someone who plays all the time and can't keep up with a poorly written guitar melody. p.s.- no one blame me for starting an arguement when all i was doing is offering up some criticism. maybe i don't play drums often enough to be amazing, but i sure as hell know when a band sucks at their timing. not to mention the vocals making my ears bleed. fact is, you guys need about 7 years of practice. talk to timm. i don't like the kid but at least he and his band(s) can play/sing.
why cant we all be friends
I could swing by sometime and re write the blogger code. I haven't done it since High School but I'm sure it wouldn't take more than a few hours and running a few cracks.

WELL no offence.. but this coming from someone that tries to play drums? you can't even make a decent beat.. my ears were ringing from the noise.. but hey.. you can practice on your stack of books and ice cream bucket. you mite get better? rite? laugh. much love. xoxo. Jon Sobie
